attributes.action: Ask George Ferguson to be open about accounts for Bristol Green Capital 2015
attributes.background: George Ferguson, Mayor of Bristol set up Bristol 2015 Ltd and was given £8 million pounds worth of tax payers money. A detailed description of the accounts needs to be published.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of your local council. 
 
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 
 
Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://epetitions.bristol.gov.uk/epetition_core/community/petitions
